fields.name: Armored (Passive):
fields.value: Your armor will protect you from the 1st attacker blocked by Defend.

fields.name: Defend (Night):
fields.value:
Defend target player, trading your life to kill their attackers. You, and anyone you kill, will be unhealable.
- ~~Bypasses death immunity.~~ *Deals Powerful Attacks.*

fields.name: Cold Steel (Night):
fields.value:
Attack target player. If you killed an ally, you will also take your own life (Unhealable). Not usable until Night 3.
- Redirect cancels ability.

fields.name: Notes:
fields.value:
Is Town Protective. If you think it should be something else because it can kill, cope seethe and mald.
Knight does not grant defense, but rather negates the attack. Defend grants Powerful defense to the Knight against the first attacker killed and only the first attacker.
